message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $18,000. This is a great deal considering its value to you is $10,000. I'm confident you'll find it worth it!
Alice, your offer is too high for me. I'm only willing to pay $10,000 for the product. This is my final offer.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $14,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you and the time we've already spent discussing the price.
